languages.text: "Сколько бед может принести одна бумажка. И сколько возможностей. {n}Глаза хладного торговца жадно блестят.{/n} "Считайте это милостью, капризом или рискованной инвестицией — я не дурак, моя жизнь для вас и трона не стоит. Но я отдам вам все, что у меня есть сейчас. А если вдруг удача поцелует меня в губы... Что ж. Я слыл кем угодно, но неблагодарной тварью — никогда".

"How much trouble one piece of paper can bring. And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."
languages.original_text: "Сколько бед может принести одна бумажка. И сколько возможностей. {n}Глаза хладного торговца жадно блестят.{/n} "Считайте это милостью, капризом или рискованной инвестицией — я не дурак, моя жизнь для вас и трона не стоит. Но я отдам вам все, что у меня есть сейчас. А если вдруг удача поцелует меня в губы... Что ж. Я слыл кем угодно, но неблагодарной тварью — никогда".

And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

"How much trouble one piece of paper can bring. And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

languages.text: “想想看，这张纸会带来多少麻烦，又会带来多少机遇。”{n}法尔科双眼中迸射着贪婪的目光。{/n}“您可以把这当成是赐予我的恩惠，或者是突发奇想、风险投资之类的。我不是傻瓜，对您来说，我的命一个子儿都不值。不过，我愿意将我拥有的一切都献给您，而如果幸运女神愿意亲吻我的话……这么说吧，我知道我的名声很不好听，但从来没人说过我忘恩负义。”
languages.original_text: "How much trouble one piece of paper can bring. And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

traits.locale_text: “想想看，这张纸会带来多少麻烦，又会带来多少机遇。”{n}法尔科双眼中迸射着贪婪的目光。{/n}“您可以把这当成是赐予我的恩惠，或者是突发奇想、风险投资之类的。我不是傻瓜，对您来说，我的命一个子儿都不值。不过，我愿意将我拥有的一切都献给您，而如果幸运女神愿意亲吻我的话……这么说吧，我知道我的名声很不好听，但从来没人说过我忘恩负义。”

languages.text: "Wie viel Ärger kann ein Stück Papier erzeugen? Und wie viele Möglichkeiten? {n}Die Augen des Kalthändlers funkeln gierig.{/n} "Seht es als Gefallen, als Laune oder als riskante Investition, ich bin kein Narr, mein Leben ist für Euch keine einzige Thronmünze wert. Aber ich gebe Euch alles, was ich habe. Und wenn das Schicksal mich auf die Lippen küsst ... Nun. Ich wurde schon vieles genannt, aber undankbar? Niemals."
languages.original_text: "How much trouble one piece of paper can bring. And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

traits.locale_text: "Wie viel Ärger kann ein Stück Papier erzeugen? Und wie viele Möglichkeiten? {n}Die Augen des Kalthändlers funkeln gierig.{/n} "Seht es als Gefallen, als Laune oder als riskante Investition, ich bin kein Narr, mein Leben ist für Euch keine einzige Thronmünze wert. Aber ich gebe Euch alles, was ich habe. Und wenn das Schicksal mich auf die Lippen küsst ... Nun. Ich wurde schon vieles genannt, aber undankbar? Niemals."

languages.text: « Quand on pense qu'un simple morceau de papier peut causer tant de problèmes, mais aussi apporter tant d'avantages, {n}dit-il avec un regard brûlant d'avidité.{/n} Considérez ça comme une faveur, un caprice ou même un investissement risqué. Je ne suis pas stupide au point de croire que ma vie a la moindre valeur à vos yeux, mais je suis prêt à vous donner tout ce que j'ai. Et si la chance me sourit... Eh bien, je suis beaucoup de choses, mais un ingrat ? Ça, sûrement pas. »
languages.original_text: "How much trouble one piece of paper can bring. And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

traits.locale_text: « Quand on pense qu'un simple morceau de papier peut causer tant de problèmes, mais aussi apporter tant d'avantages, {n}dit-il avec un regard brûlant d'avidité.{/n} « Considérez ça comme une faveur, un caprice ou même un investissement risqué. Je ne suis pas stupide au point de croire que ma vie a la moindre valeur à vos yeux, mais je suis prêt à vous donner tout ce que j'ai. Et si la chance me sourit... Eh bien, je suis beaucoup de choses, mais un ingrat ? Ça, sûrement pas. »

languages.text: «Es impresionante la cantidad de problemas que puede traer un papel. Y las oportunidades». {n}Los ojos del Comerciante Frío centellean con avaricia.{/n} «Me da igual si lo considera un favor, un capricho o una inversión arriesgada, y no soy lo bastante idiota como para pensar que mi vida vale un trono para usted. Pero le daré todo lo que llevo encima. Y si la fortuna me favorece... se me puede acusar de muchas cosas, pero nunca he sido ingrato».
languages.original_text: "How much trouble one piece of paper can bring. And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

traits.locale_text: «Es impresionante la cantidad de problemas que puede traer un papel. Y las oportunidades. {n}Los ojos del Comerciante Frío centellean con avaricia.{/n} «Me da igual si lo considera un favor, un capricho o una inversión arriesgada, y no soy lo bastante idiota como para pensar que mi vida vale un trono para usted. Pero le daré todo lo que llevo encima. Y si la fortuna me favorece... se me puede acusar de muchas cosas, pero nunca he sido ingrato».

languages.text: 「一枚の紙きれがこんなにも問題を起こすとは。そして、同時に可能性も広げてくれる」{n}闇商人の目が貪欲に輝いている。{/n}「好意か気まぐれ、または危険な投資だと思うことです。私は無知ではないし、私の命に王座の価値はない。けれど、今持っているものは全てあなたに差し上げましょう。もし幸運が私に振り向いたら…まぁ、今まで私は色々な事を世間から言われてきたが、恩知らずとだけは、呼ばれたことはありませんよ」
languages.original_text: "How much trouble one piece of paper can bring. And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

traits.locale_text: 「一枚の紙きれがこんなにも問題を起こすとは。そして、同時に可能性も広げてくれる」{n}闇商人の目が貪欲に輝いている。{/n}「好意か気まぐれ、または危険な投資だと思うことです。私は無知ではないし、私の命に王座の価値はない。けれど、今持っているものは全てあなたに差し上げましょう。もし幸運が私に振り向いたら…まぁ、今まで私は色々な事を世間から言われてきたが、恩知らずとだけは、呼ばれたことはありませんよ」

languages.text: "Bir kâğıt parçasının açtığı dertlere, kapılara bak.{n}Soğuk Tacir'in gözleri açgözlülükle ışıldıyor.{/n} "İyilik de, heves de, riskli yatırım de... Ne dersen de ama beni aptal yerine koyma. Senin için hayatımın kıymeti yok, biliyorum. Yine de neyim varsa vereceğim. Talih de dudaklarıma bir buse kondurursa... Pek çok sıfatla anıldım ama nankör... Asla olmadım."
languages.original_text: "How much trouble one piece of paper can bring. And how many opportunities. {n}The eyes of the Cold Trader glint greedily.{/n} "Consider it a favour, a whim, or a risky investment — I'm no fool, my life is not worth a throne to you. But I'll give you everything I have now. And if fortune kisses me on the lips... Well. I've been called many things, but an ingrate? Never."

traits.locale_text: "Bir kâğıt parçasının açtığı dertlere, kapılara bak.{n}Soğuk Tacir'in gözleri açgözlülükle ışıldıyor.{/n} "İyilik de, heves de, riskli yatırım de... Ne dersen de ama aptal yerine koyma. Hayatımın sende bir kıymeti yok, biliyorum. Yine de her şeyimi vereceğim. Talih de dudaklarıma bir buse kondurursa... Eh, pek çok sıfatla anıldım ama nankör? Asla olmadım."
